 2013-03322013-03-21,  JUS,  ,  , 
ActJudges Act
SubjectMary Pamela Logan ** WIDOW'S ANNUITY ** The Hon. H. David P. Logan **
PrecisGranting of an ANNUITY to MARY PAMELA LOGAN, widow of the Hon. H. David P. Logan, Judge of the Superior Court of Justice in and for the Province of Ontario, effective January 18, 2013.
AttachmentsAttachment
